item.title: atongsa's poem!
item.description: atongsa lives on earth he wondering and thinking writing and coding traveling and fishing singing and skating he loves everyting maths…
item.content:encoded:
atongsa lives on earth

he wondering and thinking
writing and coding
traveling and fishing
singing and skating

he loves everyting
maths and statistics
evolution and consicousness
galaxy and quantum information

he dies at the year of 2100AD

kk

item.title: haplonet
item.description: phase_vcf Beagle is a software package for phasing genotypes and imputing ungenotyped markers. citation: B L Browning, Y Zhou, and S R…
item.content:encoded:
phase_vcf

Beagle is a software package for phasing genotypes and imputing ungenotyped markers.

citation:
B L Browning, Y Zhou, and S R Browning (2018). A one-penny imputed genome from next generation reference panels. Am J Hum Genet 103(3):338-348. doi:10.1016/j.ajhg.2018.07.015

url: http://faculty.washington.edu/browning/beagle/beagle.html http://faculty.washington.edu/browning/beagle/run.beagle.22Jul22.46e.example

wget http://faculty.washington.edu/browning/beagle/beagle.22Jul22.46e.jar
java -jar beagle.22Jul22.46e.jar gt=test.22Jul22.46e.vcf.gz out=out.gt

vcf_2_fa

fa_2_haplonet

# lib
library(ape)
library(pegas)

kk
